root.name: constrain()

example.code: print(constrain(55, 30, 70)) # Prints "55" print(constrain(100, 30, 70)) # Prints "70" print(constrain(-15, 30, 70)) # Prints "30"

root.description: Constrains a value to not exceed a maximum and minimum value.

parameter.label: amt
parameter.description: int, or float: the value to constrain
